name: Magnet Balls 2
description:
Great physics! Great graphics! Just give it a try. You'll love it ;) Your goal is to clear all the balls from the board, scoring as many points as possible. How? You shoot at them with more balls, and when three or more of the same color come together, they all explode. Point you finger to where you want the next ball to go.

Features:

• Beautiful graphics designed
• 7 bonus balls
• Possibility to use an accelerometer
• 2 game mode (endless & adventure)
• Compete for the best score in the world
• 210 levels
• New levels coming soon

Have Fun☺
